original_text: And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.
korean_text: 너는 순금으로 등잔대를 쳐 만들되 그 밑판과 줄기와 잔과 꽃받침과 꽃을 한 덩이로 연결하고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 순수한 금으로 촛대를 만들어야 하리라

sentences.original_text: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made
sentences.korean_translation: 촛대는 망치로 두들겨 만든 작품으로 만들어지리라

sentences.original_text: his shaft shall be of the same
and his branches shall be of the same
his bowls shall be of the same
his knops shall be of the same
and his flowers shall be of the same
